<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Babylon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Babylon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Babylone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Babylon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Babylon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Babylon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Babylon</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Easy to use translation tool on the web. Translates words & text in over 75 languages</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alphabet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfach, Übersetzungshilfsmittel auf dem Web zu 
benutzen. Übersetzt Wörter u. Text innen über 75 Sprachen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Facile d'utiliser l'outil de traduction sur le 
Web. Traduit les mots et le texte dans plus de 75 langages</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fácil de usar a ferramenta de tradução no Web.
Traduz palavras & texto dentro sobre 75 línguas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facile utilizzare il mezzo di traduzione sul Web.
Traduce le parole & il testo dentro oltre 75 linguaggi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύχρηστο εργαλείο μεταφράσεων στον Ιστό. 
Μεταφράζει τις λέξεις & το κείμενο σε πάνω από 75 
γλώσσες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fácil utilizar la herramienta de traducción en 
el Web. Traduce palabras y el texto adentro sobre 75 lenguajes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übersetzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
